Content:: Russia's War Crimes House in Davos, formerly Russia House is building 68, Promenade in Davos. It was a platform for promoting Russian initiatives.[1] Now it informs about Ukrainian civilian war deaths.[2] It is rented by Victor Pinchuk.[3] This article about a Swiss building or structure is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
